review: HDCP unauthorized is an error based around the mistaken thought that the signal is being recorded/pirated. After much experimentation I realized there is a quick fix that Amazon help doesn't know about. Unplug your tv for 3 seconds. That's it. Just a quick unplug will clear the buffer or what ever in the TV that is triggering the stick to think the signal is being recorded. This buffer will clear by itself after a while somehow, but I want to watch TV on my time. 5 stars if it worked without fault, 1 star if I didn't spend hours figuring this out, and 3 now that I know. Amazon, I hope this helps you figure out how to fix it.
